float.name: ui_range_radius
float.comment: 10 is the setting for deep strike radius, if this number need to be changed, then deep strike radius needs to request programming support

list.name: requirement_table
list.comment:
Checks to see if itself is under construction, this is a Chinese-specific change from the other Landmarks that have a similar requirment (they can't build the other Landmarks of the Age, whereas the Chinese can).
---

template_reference.name: required
template_reference.comment: This requirement makes sure you cannot build this landmark when using a greater Starting Age

bool.name: only_create_capless_wall_end_gap_fillers
bool.comment: We don't want gap-fillers sticking out the front/back of the gate but we want gap-fillers if the gate is the end of the wall to make sure any gap between the wall and impasse is filled.

bool.name: override_boundary_cells
bool.comment: Allow gates to keep their boundary cells since those are the edges for interaction not the edge of the walkable surface
